text: Ara yakhana tomara balechile, ‘he musa! Amara eka'i rakama khadye kakhana'o dhairya dharana karabo na. Sutaram tumi tomara rabera kache amadera jan'ya prarthana kara – tini yena amadera jan'ya bhumijata drabya saka-sabaji, kamkura, gama, masura o pemyaja utpadana karena’. Musa balalena, ‘tomara ki uttama jinisera badale nimnamanera jinisa ca'o? Tabe kono sahare cale ya'o, tomara ya ca'o, sekhane ta ache’ [1]. Ara tadera upara lanchana o daridrya apatita halo ebam tara allah‌ra gayabera sikara halo. Eta e jan'ya ye, tara allah‌ra ayatasamuhake asbikara karato ebam nabiganake an'yayabhabe hatya karato [2]. Abadhyata o simalanghana karara jan'ya'i tadera e parinati hayechila
